attributes.action: Reduce road congestion by capping the number of new veichals.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In my email received form number 10 in response to the "road charging" The prime minister kept banging on about "congestion" on our roads and how its going to increase. I propose that the goverment CAP the amount of brand new veichals allowed to be sold in the u.k. This would slow the amount of veichals on our roads. Reduce emmisions etc. This would alos lead to recycling "old cars" instead or trading in every 3 years for a brand new one.?

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
